post_detail.title: Where I Work
post_detail.description: In a constantly evolving landscape, ClickFire Media puts all the tools along with amazing creative and technology talent under one roof to create rich, innovative interactive experiences - with an assist from Click 3X and their deep and rich resources in video, audio, VFX and CGI. We use ground-breaking technology. We bend the rules of what's possible, and we create entirely new realities in the form of brand experiences that stick to the roof of your brain.
